pullRequest.title: CLI Tools
pullRequest.bodyText:
Command line tools:

Export blocks
Export state
Show state info
Import blocks
Connect blocks
Execute blocks
Import State

nodes.bodyText: should we check the presence of the filename? same in the other classes
this returns a value that explains if the block has been connected or not. what happens if we don't check it?
why do we need to flush? since we're re executing blocks, we shouldn't be having new data here. or could we?
shouldn't we raise an error here instead of continue? why silently swallow the error?

commit.message: Skip embeddable nodes in state export
Connect blocks; changes in ShowStateInfo; remove unused imports
Add support embedded nodes with long value into export state logic
Add support embedded nodes with long value into show state information logic
Fixing optional trie issue in ShowStateInfo
Using reader as resource in try
Adding comment to CLI tools entry points

afterCommit.message: Adding comment to CLI tools entry points
